text: Fallout is a video game series created in 1997 by a company named Interplay. It was later bought by Bethesda Softworks. The games in the series are Fallout, which was made in 1997, Fallout 2, which was published in 1998, Fallout: Tactics, made in 2001, Fallout 3, made in 2008, Fallout: New Vegas, made in 2010, Fallout 4, made in 2015, and Fallout 76, published in 2018. There is a Prime Video series based on it, with the first season releasing in 2024. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Fallout Wiki
title: Fallout (series)
